Texts.Chs: 一系列元素的列表。我没时间把它们都背下来。
Texts.Eng: A list of a bunch of elements. I ain't got the time to memorize 'em all.

Texts.Chs: 所有当前已知元素的表。谁说没有更多的东西等着被发现呢？
Texts.Eng: A table of all currently known elements. Who's to say there aren't more waiting to be discovered?

Texts.Chs: 知道所有的东西都是由这样的小东西组成的，真让人感到谦卑。
Texts.Eng: It's humbling to know that all things are made up of such little ones.

Texts.Chs: 不必制作所有118种元素是喷洒的优势之一。耶，艺术许可证！
Texts.Eng: Not having to make all 118 elements is one of the perks of spriting. Yay, artistic license!

Texts.Chs: 与我们家里的表非常相似——除了这个表没有声明所有元素都是由大猿创建的。
Texts.Eng: Quite similar to the tables we have back home - save for the fact this table doesn't claim all elements were created by Big Ape.

Texts.Chs: 我们所知道的一切的基石。
Texts.Eng: The building blocks of all that we know.

Texts.Chs: 这是我见过的最无聊的俄罗斯方块游戏。。。等待
Texts.Eng: This is the most boring game of Tetris I've ever seen... Wait...
